abstracts.cdata!:
The project will include: (a) the
            provision of buildings, furniture and equipment for the
            following institutions: (i) five Regional Education Centers,
            together with vehicles for the school inspectorate; and (ii)
            one National Teaching Materials Production Center; (b)
            textbook development; (c) technical assistance for: (i) the
            National Teaching Materials Production Center in its initial
            operating stages; (ii) the statistical section ofthe
            Ministry of Education; (iii) project evaluation; and (d)
            pre-investment studies for future projects.
